dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4148 IH: To provide that the rule submitted by the Department of Labor relating to “Updating the Davis-Bacon and Related Acts Regulation” shall have no force or effect.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Smucker (for himself, Ms. Foxx, Ms. Van Duyne, Mr. Thompson of Pennsylvania, Mr. Hudson, Mr. Moolenaar, Mrs. Miller of Illinois, Mr. Mann, Mr. Self, Ms. Letlow, Mr. Rose, Mr. Williams of Texas, Mr. Weber of Texas, Mr. Sessions, Mrs. Houchin, and Mr. Baird) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To provide that the rule submitted by the Department of Labor relating to Updating the Davis-Bacon and Related Acts Regulation shall have no force or effect.

section.text: The final rule submitted by the Department of Labor relating to Updating the Davis-Bacon and Related Acts Regulation (88 Fed. Reg. 57526 (August 23, 2023)) shall have no force or effect.
